title: Balsamic glazed root vegetables
ingredients: ['5 small turnips, peeled and cut into 2.5cm dice', '5 carrots, peeled and cut into 2.5cm dice', '2 parsnips, peeled and cut into 2.5cm dice', '2 sweet potatoes, peeled and cut into 2.5cm dice', '2 teaspoons caster sugar', '4 tablespoons balsamic vinegar', 'salt and ground black pepper to taste']
